title: Hosam Ibrahim
text: This is the personal website for Hosam Ibrahim.

title: About
text: I am a PhD student in the Department of Applied Economics. My research interests include development economics, food security, labor, conflict, and education. This includes hands on experience with field work, data collection and randomized development interventions in the MENA region, the GCC, and Sub-Saharan Africa. I am currently affiliated with the International Food Policy Research Institute, the Minnesota Population Center, and the Economic Research Forum.
